name: Trailer park mechanic
description: Build cars, repair cars, consume moonshine. Welcome to Lakeview Trailer park, the oasis of opportunity.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64bit, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: +3 GHZ dual core processor Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX650 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 750 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: AMD FX-6300, Intel Core I5 Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX960 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 750 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
